ygData.subject: RE: Mesmerize vs. Charm
ygData.msgSnippet: One night waiting for some guildmates to show up in Mistmoore I used Pixie + Hymn every effectively. Another great use for it I have found it is against
ygData.messageBody:
One night waiting for some guildmates to show up in Mistmoore I used Pixie +
Hymn every effectively.
Another great use for it I have found it is against casters (used it both in
Lower Guk and Sol B). I would just PS them over and over, in most battles
the mobs would be lucky to get a single spell off :)

Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana server
Master Craftsmen of Societus Argenti

>From: David Knadler <dknadler@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>Subject: RE: [eqbards] Mesmerize vs. Charm
>Date: Wed, 6 Oct 1999 10:31:07 -0600
>
>Pixie Chase does nothing more than stun a creature. It doesn't mesmerize,
>clear the "hate" list, etc, etc, etc. It has limited applications as far
>as
>I can tell. I once tried to Pixie + Hymn my way back to full health, but
>the duration of it seems to be all over the board (as long as 10 seconds...
>as short as 1 second..)
>
>Desmei Sightblinder
>Lvl 28 Bard (Povar)
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Bard [mailto:dabard@...]
>Sent: Wednesday, October 06, 1999 5:47 AM
>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>Subject: [eqbards] Mesmerize vs. Charm
>
>
>From: "Bard" <dabard@...>
>
>Okay, I give up... what's the difference between Song of the Sirens and
>Pixie Chase?
>
>-=B=-
>Feelin' stoopit
